K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:226a-0: gser gyi me tog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs @226a *//

K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:234a-19: rnyed pa des skye bo mang po la rim gror byed /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:234a-23: de shin tu dga' zhing spro ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:234a-25: yid bde ba rgya chen po dag skyes nas dgos pa zhig gi phyir /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:234a-29: 'brog dgon pa byis pa rnams 'jigs shing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:234a-31: skyes bu des der phyin nas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:234a-34: chung ma la mi 'jigs pa byin te /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:234b-2: 'brog dgon pa der skyes bu de la gsod pa'i dgra phyir rgol ba mang po nye bar gnas par gyur nas skyes bu de'ang shes rab kyi mthu dam pa dang ldan par gyur te /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:235a-3: btang snyoms su dmigs pa'i sems kyis khyab par byas nas gnas te /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:235a-9: smon pa med pa la gnas shing /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:235a-17: dper na; 'dab chags bya ni bar snang la rgyu zhing sa la mi ltung ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:235a-18: nam mkha' bar snang la gnas kyang de la gnas pa med do //

K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:259a-19: de ltar de'i drung du bdud sdig to can nye bar 'ongs shing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:259a-20: steng gi bar snang la gnas te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:259b-0: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i dben pa ma nor @259b ba yin gyis khyod dben pa 'di nyid kyis ni rnam par spyod cig /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:259b-1: der khyod myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes zer te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:259b-2: de'i rgyus de dben pa de bas kyang dben pa de gces par 'dzin cing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:259b-4: dge slong byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa sems dang yid la bya ba yongs su dag pa des dge ba'i chos dang ldan pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:259b-5: gzhan dag la tshe dang ldan pa 'di dag ni 'du 'dzi'i rnam par spyod pas rnam par spyod do zhes khyad du gsod cing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:259b-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dben par spyod pa de dag la 'du 'dzis rnam par spyod par skyon du gdags pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:259b-7: 'dres par rnam par spyod par skyon du gdags pas brnyas pa'i sems bskyed do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:259b-8: gang 'du 'dzi'i rnam par spyod par rnam par spyod pa de dag la ni dben pas rnam par spyod pas 'dzin cing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:259b-9: de dag la rim gror bskyed do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:259b-10: gang la rim gro bskyed par bya ba de dag la ni nga rgyal bskyed do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:259b-12: de ni 'di ltar bdag ni mi ma yin pas bskul ba'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:259b-13: mi ma yin pas dran par bya ba'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:259b-14: rnam par spyod pa gang gis bdag spyod pa de ni rnam par spyod pa ma nor ba ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:259b-15: grong 'dabs na spyod pa la lta su zhig bskul bar 'gyur /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:259b-16: grong 'dabs na spyod pa lta su zhig dran par byed par 'gyur zhes nga rgyal bskyed de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:260a-0: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de @260a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:260a-1: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i rigs kyi bu gzhan dag la smod par byed de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:260a-3: gang zag de ni byang chub sems dpa' gdol par rig par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:260a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sun 'byin par rig par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:260a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan du rig par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:260a-6: de ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rkun po ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:260a-7: de ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis dge sbyong gi cha byad kyi rkun por rig par bya ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:260a-8: ngang tshul de lta bu dang ldan pa'i gang zag ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:260a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis bsnyen par mi bya /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:260a-14: gang zag de lta bu dag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:260a-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongs su ma btang la /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:260a-16: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yongs su ma btang na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:260a-17: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa thag pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:260a-18: sems can thams cad kyi don bya bar 'dod pa des /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:260a-19: gang zag de lta bu'i ngang tshul can bsnyen par mi bya /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:260b-0: @260b rang gi don dang ldan par 'gyur ba la brtson par bya ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:260b-1: 'khor ba las rtag tu skyo zhing 'jigs pa'i yid kyis khams gsum dang ma 'dres par spyad par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:260b-2: byang chub sems dpa' gdol pa de la'ang byams pa bskyed par bya ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:260b-3: de nyid la snying brtse ba'i phyir snying rje bskyed par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:260b-4: dga' ba dang btang snyoms bskyed par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:260b-5: des sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste; ci nas kyang bdag gi nyes pa 'di dag thams cad du thams cad med cing mi skye bar 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:260b-6: gal te skyes na'ang myur du spang bar bya'o zhes bslab par bya ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:260b-8: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rang gis khong du chud pa'i mngon par shes pa'i mthur rig par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:260b-10: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:260b-11: dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la bsnyen par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:260b-16: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bgyi ba de dag gang lags /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:260b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:260b-19: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:261a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes @261a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:261a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:261a-8: rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed pa dang /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:261a-11: gzhan yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:261a-12: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o //

K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:261a-14: dbang po lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o //

K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:276a-26: de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:277a-3: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod par khams kyi bsod snyoms la yongs su spyod par 'dod pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:277a-4: sems can thams cad kyi lam bstan par 'dod pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:277a-5: snang ba chen po 'byung bar 'dod pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:277a-6: khams gsum gyi btson ra na gnas pa'i sems can rnams yongs su dgrol bar 'dod pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:277a-7: sems can thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i shes rab kyi mig bskyed par 'dod pas /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:277a-9: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par mi spyod na'ang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:277a-10: des yid la bya ba gzhan gyi go skabs mi dbye ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:277a-11: des ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba nyid kyis nyin mtshan du mi gtong zhing brtson par gnas pa de ltar bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:277a-15: sngon chad nor bu rin po che rnyed ma myong ba'i skyes bu zhig yod la des dus gzhan zhig na nor bu rin po che rnyed par gyur te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:277a-16: des nor bu rin po che de rnyed pas dga' ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:277a-18: yid bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa las /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:277b-0: des nor bu rin @277b po che de rnyed ma thag tu stor bar gyur na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:277b-1: de'i rgyus sdug bsngal ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:277b-2: yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:277b-3: rtag tu rgyun mi chad par kyi hud bdag ni yid du 'ong ba'i nor bu rin po che de dang bral bar gyur to zhes nor bu rin po che dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba sha stag rgyun du 'byung ngo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:277b-5: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ni rin po che'i snyam du bsams te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:277b-6: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:277b-7: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che de stor bar yang mi bya ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:277b-8: de ltar na rtag tu bde ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:277b-9: yid bde ba mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:277b-12: yid la bgyi ba de dag thams cad kyang rang bzhin dang bral ba ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:277b-13: yid la bgyi ba thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:277b-14: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral ba lags /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:277b-15: bral ba la ni byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:277b-16: yid la bgyi ba mi dmigs /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:277b-17: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:277b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:278a-0: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar chos @278a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:278a-1: thams cad ni rang bzhin dang bral ba ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:278a-2: de ni nyan thos kyis ma byas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:278a-3: rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:278a-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang ma mdzad de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:278a-5: chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:278a-7: chos skyon med pa nyid dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:278a-9: ma nor ba de bzhin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:278a-10: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:278a-12: yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni gnas pa yin no zhes bya bar shes na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba yin te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:278a-15: de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis dben /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:278a-16: rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:278a-21: gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin gyis dben zhing rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:278a-23: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las yang dag par byung zhing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:278a-24: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:278b-1: de bzhin nyid la 'phel ba'am yongs su 'grib pa med do; ;chos kyi dbyings la 'phel ba'am yongs su 'grib pa med do //

K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:278b-4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gcig kyang ma yin /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:278b-7: gal te de skad du bshad pa la /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:278b-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'jum mi 'gong /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:278b-10: skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i dbyings la gnas pa ste /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:278b-13: bam po nyis brgya zhe bzhi pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:278b-16: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:278b-20: snying po ma mchis pa gang lags pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:309b-4: lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'am mtshe ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so; ;lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan yang dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:309b-5: lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' yang 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:309b-6: lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur yang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:309b-7: tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po 'ang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:309b-8: kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:309b-9: dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:309b-10: 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:309b-11: mi che ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:309b-12: mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:310a-1: tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:310a-2: gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:310a-3: gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:310a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:310a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang rtag tu dgongs pa yin te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:310a-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la de ltar spyod pa de'i lus la ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:310a-7: 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa gang ji snyed cig lus la 'byung ba de dag kyang thams cad du thams cad lus la mi 'byung mi 'bab ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:310a-8: dge slong de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:310a-10: 'dus pa'i nad rnams gang ji snyed pa 'di lta ste; mig gi nad dam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:310a-15: snying gi nad gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang lus la mi 'byung mi 'bab ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:310a-16: 'di dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:310a-17: 'di'i yon tan du rig par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:310b-0: de nas tshe dang ldan pa @310b dga' bo 'di snyam du gyur te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:310b-1: lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di rang gi spobs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston cing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:310b-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan dang legs pa brjod dam; 'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus ston snyam pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:310b-3: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:310b-4: tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:310b-6: bdag de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:310b-7: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan dang legs pa brjod pa ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:310b-8: sangs rgyas kyi mthur rig par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:310b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:310b-12: de de bzhin te; lha'i dbang po brgya byin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:310b-13: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i yon tan dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:310b-14: legs pa brjod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:310b-15: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:310b-17: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:310b-18: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:310b-19: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa de'i tshe /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:311a-0: gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud sdig to @311a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:311a-1: can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byas te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:311a-2: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:311a-3: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:311a-6: rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ram /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:311a-8: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:311a-11: gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:311a-12: bdud sdig to can mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug par 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:311a-14: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:311a-15: bdud sdig to can ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa las sems gcig tsam 'khrug par 'gyur ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:311a-17: spu g-yo bar 'gyur bar skar mda' ltung bar gtong zhing 'jigs pa bskyed do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:311a-18: de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:311b-0: @311b byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas mchi bar 'gyur ram /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:311b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:311b-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas 'ong ba ma yin no //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:311b-6: 'o na ji lta bu'i drung du mchi bar 'gyur /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:311b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:311b-9: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sngon gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:311b-10: sems mos par ma byas pa de'i drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong ngo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:311b-12: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:311b-13: 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:311b-14: 'on tam ma yin zhes the tshom du gyur pa de dag gi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong ngo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:311b-16: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:311b-17: des dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi mthong bas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:311b-18: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi thos so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:311b-19: ma thos pas mi shes so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:311b-20: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bsgom pa ma shes pas de bzhin nyid du nan tan mi byed do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312a-0: byang chub sems dpa' de la'ang bdud sdig to can gyis @312a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312a-3: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral la /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312a-4: dam pa'i chos ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin pa byed na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312a-6: byang chub sems dpa' de la'ang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312a-8: gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos ma yin pa la bsngags pa brjod na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312a-9: de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312a-10: gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba ni bdag gi grogs yin te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312a-11: gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba 'di ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa mang po'i nang nas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312a-13: bdag gis grogs su rnyed pa ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312a-14: de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'di lta ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312a-15: nyan thos kyi sa dang; rang sangs rgyas kyi sa gnyis las gcig tu gnas par 'gyur ba ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312a-16: de bdag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o snyam ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312a-18: byang chub sems dpa' de la'ang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312a-20: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu la bdud kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur zhe na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312a-21: byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312a-22: 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu zab ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312b-0: khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo @312b 'di thos pas ci zhig bya /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312b-1: bsgoms pa dang bzung ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312b-3: kun chub par byas pas kyang ci zhig bya /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312b-4: ngas kyang de'i gting ma rnyed na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312b-5: khyod kyis lta rnyed re skan zhes zer na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312b-6: dga' bo; byang chub sems dpa' de la'ang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312b-8: gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan la byang chub sems dpa' brnyes par skyed cing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312b-9: nga ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312b-10: nga ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312b-11: nga ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o; ;nga ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312b-12: nga ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312b-13: nga ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312b-14: khyod ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312b-15: khyod ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312b-16: khyod ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312b-17: khyod ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312b-18: khyod ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312b-19: khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no zhes rlom sems su byed na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:312b-21: byang chub sems dpa' de la'ang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313a-0: gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bdag @313a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313a-1: nyid mchog tu rlom sems bskyed na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313a-3: de'i tshe bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313a-7: tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313a-9: byang chub sems dpa' de la'ang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i ming brjod pa'am /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313a-13: rus brjod pa kun tu grags par gyur na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313a-14: de ming brjod pa 'am rus brjod pa des /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313a-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dge ba'i chos can dag khyad du gsod cing bdag bstod gzhan smod la /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313a-16: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313a-18: mtshan mar bya ba'i yon tan de dag kyang de la med par rnam pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313a-20: mtshan ma de dag gis nyon mongs pa bskyed cing bdag bstod gzhan smod de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313a-21: 'di skad du ji ltar nga byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313a-22: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par snang ba de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas par mi snang ngo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313a-23: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par mi snang ngo zhes de de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag la mi snyan par brjod cing smod na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313a-24: de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313b-0: bdag gi gnas ni stongs @313b par mi 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313b-1: sems can dmyal ba chen po dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313b-2: byol song gi skye gnas dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313b-4: yi dvags kyi yul yang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes ci nas kyang de'i tshig gzung du rung bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bdud sdig to can byang chub sems dpa' de byin gyis rlob ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313b-5: de'i tshig bzung du rung bas skye bo mang po dag kyang mnyan pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313b-6: yid ches par bya bar sems te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313b-7: de la de dag gis thos sam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313b-8: mthong na mthun par spyod par 'gyur te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313b-9: de dag gis thos sam mthong nas mthun par spyod cing de bzhin du slob ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313b-10: de dag de bzhin nyid du slob cing de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa'i tshe /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313b-11: nyon mongs pa shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313b-12: de ltar de dag bsam pa phyin ci log du gyur pas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313b-13: lus dang ngag dang yid kyis las gang dang gang brtsams pa de thams cad mi 'dod pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313b-15: yid du mi 'ong bar 'grub par 'gyur te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313b-16: de ltar na sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag kyang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313b-17: byol song gi skye gnas dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313b-19: yi dvags kyi yul yang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313b-20: bdud kyi gnas kyang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur bas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313b-22: don gyi dbang de mthong nas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313b-23: bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:313b-26: yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314a-0: gzhan yang gal te gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg @314a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314a-1: pa pa gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang rtsod cing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314a-2: nga ni mchog tu gyur pa yin gyi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314a-3: khyod ni ma yin no zhes zer na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314a-4: de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314a-5: kye rigs kyi bu 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ring du byed pa ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314a-6: 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314a-11: mtshang 'dru ba 'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314a-12: de ni sems can dmyal ba'i lam mo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314a-13: de ni byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam mo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314a-14: de ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam mo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314a-15: de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam ma yin no snyam du sems par 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314a-17: gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314a-18: gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gzhan du 'thab cing rtsod la /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314a-20: de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te; 'di gnyis ka'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314a-21: 'di gnyis ka'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314a-22: 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis gang brtsams pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314b-0: rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis ni sems @314b can dmyal ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314b-1: byol song gi skye gnas dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314b-2: gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam brtsams so zhes nas dga' zhing spro ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314b-3: tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314b-5: gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' lung ma bstan pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314b-6: byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa la gnod par sems shing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314b-7: 'thab cing rtsod la 'khrug cing mtshang 'dru na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314b-8: gal te des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi btang zhe na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314b-9: ci tsam du sdig pa'i sems bskyed pa skyes pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314b-11: 'khrug cing mtshang 'dru bar gyur ba de srid kyi bskal par go cha bgo bar bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314b-14: dedag gi sems bskyed pa de dag la 'byung ba gzhan mchis sam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314b-15: 'on te ma lags kyi; bskal pa de snyed kho nar go cha bgo 'chal /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314b-18: gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314b-19: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314b-20: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la ngas 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos bstan te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314b-22: de la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314b-23: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dang 'thab cing rtsod la gshe zhing mi snyan du brjod pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314b-24: 'thab cing rtsod de gshe ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:314b-25: mi snyan par brjod pa byas nas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315a-1: par mdud par 'dzin cing khon du gzung ste gnas na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315a-3: gang zag de ni 'byung bar nga mi smra ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315a-4: gang zag des gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi btang zhe na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315a-5: gdon mi za bar bskal ba de snyed du go cha bgo bar bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315a-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'thab cing rtsod de gshe ba dang mi snyan par brjod par gyur na'ang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315a-8: mdud par mi 'dzin la phyin chad sdom pa 'dzin cing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315a-9: bdag gis ni thob par bya ba nyes par thob ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315a-10: bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal dgos na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315a-11: de ltar bdag smras pa la phyir smra ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315a-12: bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi zam par gyur par bya dgos na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315a-13: de ltar na bdag gzhan la mi snyan par smra zhing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315a-14: phyir zlogs pa ni mi tshul gyis /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315a-15: bdag gis de ltar mi bya'i /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315a-18: bdag gi bsam pa la 'khrug pa med par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315a-19: sems can 'di dag ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315a-20: yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya dgos na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315a-21: de dag nyid la bdag ngan sems su byed pa dang de dag nyid la bdag 'khrug pa ni tshul ma yin gyi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315a-22: bdag gis de dag la gnod sems su mi bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315b-0: bdag gis @315b de dag la 'khrug par mi bya'o snyam na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'byung ba yod par ngas bshad de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315b-3: de la ni bdud sdig to can glags lta zhing glags tshol bas kyang glags mi rnyed do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315b-5: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang 'grogs par mi bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315b-6: de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas par mi bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315b-8: gal te 'dug na'ang des su la'ang gnod sems su mi bya /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315b-11: gang bdag gis 'di dag la gnod sems su bya ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315b-12: 'khrug par bya ba de ni bdag la mi tshul lo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315b-14: 'di ltar de dag ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315b-15: sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya ba dag go snyam du bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315b-18: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dag dang gnas par bgyi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315b-23: ston pa dang ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:315b-24: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang gnas par bya ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316a-1: na; 'di ni bdag gi grogs te gru gcig tu zhugs pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316a-2: 'dis ji ltar bslab par bya ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316a-3: 'dis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316a-4: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316a-5: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316a-6: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316a-7: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316a-8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316a-11: phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316a-12: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316a-13: chen po stong pa nyid dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316a-14: don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316a-16: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316a-17: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316a-18: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316a-19: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316a-20: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316a-21: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316a-22: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316a-23: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316a-24: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316a-25: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316a-27: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316a-28: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316a-29: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316a-32: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316a-33: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316b-1: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316b-2: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316b-3: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316b-4: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316b-7: mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316b-9: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316b-12: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316b-15: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316b-16: thams cad shes pa nyid dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316b-17: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316b-18: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang la bslab par bya ba de nyid la bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316b-19: des gzhan yang sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316b-20: 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ston pa ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316b-21: gal te de 'dres par spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang bral bar gyur na de la bdag gis bslab par mi bya'i /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316b-22: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar gnas na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:316b-23: bdag gis kyang de ltar bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:317a-0: de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni @317a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:317a-1: bslab pa mnyam pa yin no //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:317a-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:317a-3: le'u bzhi bcu zhe drug pa'o ////
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:317a-4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:317a-5: bam po nyis brgya zhe drug pa //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:317a-6: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:317a-7: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //

K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:317a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:317a-12: nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:317a-14: phyi stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do //

K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:317a-20: chen po stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:317a-22: don dam pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:317b-0: @317b 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:317b-2: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:317b-4: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do //

K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:381b-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:409a-5: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:409a-6: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:409a-7: bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:409a-8: tshad med pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:409a-9: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o; ;rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:409a-10: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //

K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:409a-13: smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:409a-14: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:409a-15: ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:409a-16: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //

K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:409a-19: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:409a-20: byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:409b-0: @409b snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:409b-1: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:409b-2: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:409b-3: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:409b-4: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:409b-5: dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:409b-6: rang byang chub yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:409b-7: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:409b-8: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o zhes dgongs pa mdzad do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:409b-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:409b-11: gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar zhugs par rig par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:409b-13: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:409b-14: sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bdud sdig to can du gyur te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:409b-15: bdud sdig to can de dag re res kyang de snyed kyi bdud sdig to can mngon par sprul kyang de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la bar chad bya bar mi nus so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410a-0: chos gnyis dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems @410a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410a-1: dpa' chen po ni bdud sdig to can rnams kyis mi thub pa yin te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410a-3: des chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya bar rnam par bltas pa yin /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410a-4: des sems can thams cad kyang yongs su ma btang ba yin te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410a-6: chos 'di gnyis dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdud sdig to can rnams kyis mi thub pa yin no //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410a-8: gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis dang ldan pa bdud sdig to can rnams kyis mi thub pa yin te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410a-10: ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa yin /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410a-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa yin te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410a-13: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos de gnyis dang ldan pa ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410a-14: bdud sdig to can rnams kyis mi thub pa yin no //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410a-16: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du ni lha'i bu rnams kyang 'ong bar sems so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410a-19: kun dri ba'ang byed par 'gyur te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410a-20: rigs kyi bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur gyi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410a-21: de bas na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di lta ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410a-22: stong pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410b-0: @410b mtshan ma med pas rnam par spyod pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410b-1: smon pa med pas rnam par spyod pa de nyid kyis rnam par spyod par gyis shig /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410b-3: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis rnam par spyod pa des /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410b-5: sems can mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon du 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410b-6: sems can skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410b-7: sems can dpung gnyen med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen du 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410b-8: sems can gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410b-9: sems can rten med pa rnams kyi rten du 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410b-10: sems can gling med pa rnams kyi gling du 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410b-11: sems can mun par gyur pa rnams kyi snang bar 'gyur ro zhes de la spro ba skyed par 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410b-13: de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410b-14: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor te bzhugs shing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410b-16: chos ston pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'di lta ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410b-17: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i ming dang rigs yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:410b-18: ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa mdzad de /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:411a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug phud kyi ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa dang /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:412b-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:412b-9: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyi bar du byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:412b-10: ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:413a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @413a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:413a-1: chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don du zhugs pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:413a-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slar ldog pa'am /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:413a-5: slar mi ldog pa'am gang gi ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa mdzad /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:413a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:413a-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog pa las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang yod /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:413a-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lung ma bstan pa las /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:413a-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang yod de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:413a-11: de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:413a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:413a-17: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:413b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i rjes su slob pa'i tshul gyis rnam par spyod pa de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul @413b gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:413b-2: gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen dpal gyi rjes su slob pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de dag la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do; ;rab 'byor /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:413b-3: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:413b-4: chos thams cad skye ba med par mos kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:413b-5: chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:413b-6: chos thams cad zhi ba'o zhes bya ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:413b-9: rag lus pa'o zhes bya ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:413b-10: snying po med pa'o zhes bya bar mos kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa de dag la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:413b-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:413b-14: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa spangs pa yin te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:414a-1: na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'ang lung bstan pa yin /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:414a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:414a-4: de la gnas pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:414a-5: rab 'byor; gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bshad pa thos nas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:414a-6: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ji ltar bshad pa de bzhin no zhes nem nur med cing the tshom mi za la rmongs par mi 'gyur na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:414a-7: des ni phyis kyang rgya cher de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:414a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag las thos par 'gyur te /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419a-4: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419a-5: gang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419a-6: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419a-7: gang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419a-8: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419a-9: gang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419a-10: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na; gang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419a-12: gang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419a-13: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419a-14: gang yang dag par spong ba rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419a-15: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na; gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419a-16: dbang po rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419a-17: gang dbang po rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419a-18: stobs rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419a-19: gang stobs rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419a-20: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419a-21: gang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419b-0: 'phags @419b pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419b-1: gang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419b-2: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419b-3: gang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419b-4: bsam gtan rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419b-5: gang bsam gtan rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419b-6: tshad med pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na; gang tshad med pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419b-7: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419b-8: gang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419b-9: rnam par thar pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419b-10: gang rnam par thar pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419b-11: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419b-12: gang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419b-13: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419b-15: smon pa med pa'ang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419b-16: gang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419b-18: smon pa med pa la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419b-19: mngon par shes pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419b-20: gang mngon par shes pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:419b-21: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420a-0: gang ting nge 'dzin rnams la bsgom pa lta ci @420a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420a-2: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420a-3: gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420a-5: gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par bsgrub pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420a-6: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420a-7: gang mi 'jigs pa rnams mngon par bsgrub pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420a-8: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420a-9: gang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mngon par bsgrub pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420a-10: byams pa chen po nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420a-11: gang byams pa chen po la rnam par spyod pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420a-12: snying rje chen po nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420a-13: gang snying rje chen po la rnam par spyod pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420a-14: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420a-15: gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par bsgrub pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420a-16: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420a-17: gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420a-18: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420a-19: gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420a-20: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420b-0: gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu @420b rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420b-1: dgra bcom pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420b-2: gang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420b-3: rang byang chub nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420b-4: gang rang byang chub kyi 'bras bu rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420b-5: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420b-6: gang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420b-7: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420b-8: gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420b-9: de bzhin nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420b-10: gang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420b-11: ma skyes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420b-12: gang ma skyes pa mngon du byed pa lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420b-13: mtshan rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420b-14: gang gi lus la mtshan yod par 'gyur ba lta ci smos; dpe byad rnams kyang mi dmigs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420b-15: gang gi lus la dpe byad yod par 'gyur ba lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420b-18: gnas brtan rab 'byor ni chos thams cad dben pa la rnam par spyod pa ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420b-19: dmigs su med pa la rnam par spyod pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420b-20: stong pa nyid la rnam par spyod pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420b-21: mtshan ma med pa la rnam par spyod pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420b-22: smon pa med pa la rnam par spyod pa ste; koo shi ka /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:420b-23: gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa des ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod @421a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421a-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa la brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421a-3: stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421a-4: brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421a-5: bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421a-6: bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421a-7: bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421a-8: bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421a-9: bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421a-14: rgyur yang nye bar mi bzod do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421a-15: de ci'i phyir zhe na; de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par spyod pa ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421a-16: nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421a-17: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa'i rnam par spyod pa de dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa 'di nyid ni mchog ces bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421a-25: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421b-0: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams @421b cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur bar 'dod pas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421b-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par spyod pa 'di nyid kyis rnam par spyod par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421b-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421b-6: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug go /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs nas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421b-9: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421b-10: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas nas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421b-11: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421b-12: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes rjes su thob nas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421b-13: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro ////
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421b-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421b-15: bam po nyis brgya lnga gcig pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421b-16: de nas 'khor de'i nang nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams ma tog manda ra ba mang po thogs te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421b-17: bcom ldan 'das la gtor to; ;mngon par gtor to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:421b-19: dge slong brgya drug cu tsam yang stan las langs nas chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:422a-0: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs @422a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:422a-1: nas; bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud nas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:422a-2: bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing phyag 'tshal lo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:422a-3: dge slong de dag gis thal mo sbyor te btud pa'i tshe /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:422a-4: sangs rgyas kyi mthus snyim pa me tog manda ra bas gang bar gyur nas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:422a-5: me tog manda ra ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gtor to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:422a-8: de ltar 'thor zhing mngon par 'thor ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:422a-9: rab tu 'thor ba'i tshe; tshig 'di skad ces brjod de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:422a-11: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis nyan thos dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:422a-12: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul ma lags pa'i rnam par spyod pa dam pas; bdag cag rnam par spyod par gyur cig ces smras pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:422a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag gis bsam pa thugs su chud de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:422a-14: de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do; ;sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid kyis kyang de ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:422a-15: de ltar 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i tshe /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:422a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'di lta ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:422a-23: dngul gyi kha dog lta bu rnam pa sna tshogs byung ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:422b-0: de dag gis stong gsum gyi @422b stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas rgyas par bkang nas phyir 'dus te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:422b-1: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:422b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:422b-3: de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo stan las langs nas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:422b-4: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:422b-5: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:422b-6: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:422b-7: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:422b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:422b-10: ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'dzum pa mdzad /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:422b-11: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:422b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:422b-14: dge slong brgya drug cu po 'di dag bskal pa dpe skar ma lta bu la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:422b-15: me tog sil ma zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sha stag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:423a-0: dga' bo me tog sil ma zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi dge slong gi dge 'dun mtshungs @423a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:423a-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtshungs par 'gyur /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:423a-4: lo stong du mtshungs par 'gyur te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:423a-5: de dag gang dang gang nas mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:423a-6: mngon par byung nas rab tu 'byung ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:423a-7: rab tu byung nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de dang de dag tu me tog kha dog rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i me tog gi char mngon par 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:423a-9: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par spyod pa'i dam pas rnam par spyod par 'dod pas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:423a-10: shes [*rab?] kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:423a-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par spyod pas rnam par spyad par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:423a-13: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:423a-14: rigs kyi bu mo des 'di ltar bdag ni mi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa'am /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:423a-15: dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:423a-16: mi'i nang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rgya cher thos pa'am /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:423b-0: dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su @423b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rgya cher thos pa'o zhes bya bar rtogs par rig par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:423b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gzigs par bltas te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:423b-4: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:423b-8: kun chub par byed pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:423b-9: tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:423b-10: gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston cing rjes su 'doms pa'i gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa des /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:423b-11: bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par gyur /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:423b-15: kun chub par byas par gyur te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-023-001:423b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la 'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po bskyed par gyur to zhes bya bar rtogs par rig par bya ste /
